embeds.title: How tracker resetting works
embeds.description: Due to recent growth as well as changes to *Hypixel*'s API policy, we are unable to continue to offer automatic historical resetting to everyone. In order to reduce automatic polling of the *Hypixel API*, we are introducing a new system of resetting historical stats.

fields.name: Request Data Reuse Resets
fields.value: This method of resetting historical stats takes a slightly difference approach. Instead of fetching a player's stats every `x` amount of time (in order to extrapolate historical stats), whenever a player's data is fetched from the *Hypixel API*, that data will simultaneously be used to reset historical stats. This approach will reset historical stats **__only if__** it has been the correct amount of time since the last reset.

fields.name: Automatic Resets
fields.value: This method, only available to [pro users](https://statalytics.net/store), takes the old approach. For every `x` amount of time that passes, historical stats will be reset.
